title: City Outside, Tranquility Inside
map_address: 2330 Broadway near Arapahoe st, Park Avenue and Broadway
posting_body: Call today to schedule your personal tour.
Our location in Denver's 80205 area is an ideal place for those seeking a luxury lifestyle with affordable pricing.
We have a  unique collection of amenities available at Broadway Plaza Lofts.
Some of these include convenient on-site parking options, a fitness center, and our rooftop community lounge.
We offer studio, one bedroom and 2-bedroom floor plans ranging from 400-933 sq.
This apartment community has 9 floors with amazing downtown and mountain views.
We offer onsite laundry, floor to ceiling windows and exposed concrete.
Come home to Broadway Plaza Lofts and enjoy the best of downtown living.
Additional amenities: Utilities: All Utilities Paid Laundry: Onsite Parking:

Attached Parking Garage Appliances: Dishwasher, Refrigerator, Range/Oven Heating/cooling: Heat/AC unit Wiring: Cable-ready, High-speed internet Facilities and Recreation: Fitness center, Rooftop Patio, Security and Access: Controlled access, Elevator Views: Breathtaking city & mountain Additional features:  Large Modern Floor Plans
